Rumble buffs got me hyped
Also, can anyone tell me how you win key fragments in games? Because I can't see any consistency in it. E.g. Won a normal 5v5, scoring S, teammate scores S+, but no key fragment.

Only chests drop for S games, key fragments are random drops with the chance increasing if you are playing with premades. Also with each key you get in a month, the next key has less chance, reseting each month.
Thanks :)
Hi Riot, I redeemed a 25AUD RP card this morning but the amount did not appear on my account. Then I saw the RP purchase temporarily unavailable sign. What do I do now, and when will I get my RP?

put in a ticket to riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) immediately. I'm not sure what to put it as, maybe technical issues? just put something in ASAP and they'll get back to you.

Wait, so MF's W now has a 12 second cooldown beginning at the same time as the 4 second activation, making it ..8 seconds after its finished until you can use it again? Another "either played or banned" in rank?
Still no fix for Jinx's Q not switching back to minigun during combat? Cmon guys, this is getting ridiculous! Q, Q, Q, Q, Q! F* IT! R!
Umm While nice to say u are fixing the spellshield bug, i have had a couple of cases were Anivia's q went thru and did the damage and stunned me as sivir

Anivia's Q does have two parts to it - it damages when it goes through you then it also damages and stuns when detonated. Perhaps the spell shield may have only blocked the first part (just a suggestion).
It was within 0.5 sec of contact and explosion (or simply there was no time to distingush between the two).
When will the update with all the new dragons drop?
That will likely come 6.9 at earliest.

Could you make the W on-hit scalings a bit clearer please? Because 1% per 50 is still the same as 1% per 33. Its still just 1%. Im guessing it means 2% of total AP increased to 3% of total AP, but the ambiguity could also mean that it was 1% for every 50AP you had, so at 500AP the scaling would be 10%, (therefore now a 10% scaling at 330 AP).

Would just be much clearer if you used actual percentage rather than " 1 per cent per 33" which essentially means 1 per 100 per 33 AP

The damage dealt by his W is based on his opponents max health. The percentage is the fraction of their max health that it deals. Hence his W deals 3% + 1% per 33 ap of his opponents max health damage.
